transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji sir, good morning.
Executive: Good morning.
Customer: Gaurav baat kar raha hun Haryana se.
Executive: Achcha, ji?
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Actually aapka profile hai na sir, Northern Bengal system. Usi ke regarding call kiya tha aapne function request kiya tha na, main 3 science se call kiya tha.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ji, ji. To aapko connect kar lu sir, guide kar du sari chije?
Customer: Haan, kar do guide aap.
Executive: Ji, aapka jo sir mail ID hai IndiaMART ka?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Usi pe main aapko share kar raha hun Google Meet ka link, video meeting ka.
Customer: Abhi video meeting to main kar nahi paunga sir.
Executive: Kis time free hai kyunki guide karunga na sara portal aapko, sari chije. To usi pe connect karke karunga.
Customer: Man ke chaliye 6:30 baje kareeb.
Executive: 6:30 baje?
Customer: Ji. Uske pehle possibilities ho to?
Executive: Nahi, nahi, nahi. Kyunki 6:00 baje office off ho jata hai.
Executive: Ji. Achcha, achcha.
Customer: Ji, ji. 6:00 baje kar lena fir aap.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs guidance on IndiaMART portal.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to connect at 6:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, video meeting, guidance
